help-file.title: TOGGLE_WEBINFO
help-file.content:
Syntax: toggle webinfo
In the interests of providing an informative and interactive website, we develop and show statistics about such things as Top Players, PvP kills and equipment worn during raids on the website.
This toggle allows us to display more information over and above the general, non-sensitive information like frag and experience progress. One of the things toggling this setting to OFF will restrict is EQ display, and other such more specific character information.
Please note, that any such information shown on the website has an 30 minute delay before release.
If you do not wish more specific information shown, please ensure that this option is set to OFF. It is by default OFF.
